suggestions.title: Deep Work Opportunity
suggestions.message: You have a 90-minute gap before your 3:30 meeting. Based on your patterns, this is your peak productivity time. Perfect for 'Write Documentation' task.
suggestions.reasoning: High energy + calendar gap + priority match + pattern fit

suggestions.title: Break Reminder
suggestions.message: You've been in focused work for 2 hours. A 10-minute break will improve your next session's productivity by 25%.
suggestions.reasoning: Continuous work detected + pattern analysis + energy optimization

suggestions.title: Quick Task Batch
suggestions.message: You have 3 tasks under 15 minutes each. Knock them out in your 30-minute gap before lunch.
suggestions.reasoning: Small calendar gap + low-effort tasks + momentum building

suggestions.title: Prepare for Architecture Review
suggestions.message: Your 2:00 PM meeting has 8 attendees. Review the agenda and materials now to maximize effectiveness.
suggestions.reasoning: Important meeting + preparation time available + effectiveness boost

suggestions.title: Reschedule Complex Task
suggestions.message: Move 'System Architecture Design' from 4 PM to 10 AM tomorrow. Your morning slots have 2x higher success rate for complex tasks.
suggestions.reasoning: Energy pattern + task complexity + optimal timing
